form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screened by NARA, 7/31/292023, Form No I-130's

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 ha M Desai S St Andrews P1 # 8 Los Angeles, Ca. 90020 September 1, 1987 To, The Director Western Region Remoting Program Western Adjudication Center P. 0, Box 73016 San Ysidro, Ca. 92073 Dear Sir, Re : Name of Benificiary - Desai Mohanlal Dayalji Desai Nootanbala Vijaykumar Date: 8-16-1987 Form No I-130's I have enclosed all the supporting documents and completed all the instructions on my both applications as requested. It is almost an year since I filed my applications and I would like to urge you to expedite the process of granting status as there is goone to look after my dad in my home country since my mom passed away six years ago. He may not live longer due to demise and I just want to bring him over here for a short time. I also donot want to live my whole life with a guilty conscious for not spending a short time with him during his last days. This may sound very crazy to you, Sir , but due to the long interval of time factor, I am compelled to disclose the true picture. The following documents are attached herewith: 1 - The letter of the Mayor [ Chief Officer of Gandevi 1, is resubmitted who has the juridiction over non-existence records. 2 - The letters of two relatives whose names are (i) Induben Desai and (ii) Ramanlal Vashi, those who have the firsthand knowledge of Nootanbala's and Taraben's births. Thank you very much and requesting you to do needful in the matter. Sincerely, Recha M. - Desas Rekha M Desai [Mrs] copy : file
